meanings.definition: Below the usual or required standard.
meanings.sent1: The student's work was considered substandard by the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The substandard quality of the product led to many customer complaints.
meanings.sent3: The substandard cake was so bad that even the dog refused to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The substandard performance of the team cost them the championship.
meanings.sent5: The substandard building materials caused the house to collapse.

meanings.definition: A level of quality or achievement that is below what is expected or required.
meanings.sent1: The company had to recall the product due to substandard manufacturing.
meanings.sent2: The substandards of the project were evident in the final presentation.
meanings.sent3: The chef's substandards in the kitchen resulted in a hilarious cooking disaster.
meanings.sent4: The student's substandards in math class were like trying to solve a puzzle blindfolded.
meanings.sent5: The substandards of the service left a lasting negative impression on the customers.
